nodes.caption: Disclosure process factors - To whom to disclose - When to disclose - Preparation of disclosure - Content of disclosure message - Communication style
Workplace factors - Level of responsibility - Social Climate - Sector
Financial factors - Economy (poor versus strong) - Subsidy for employer
Employee Factors - Symptom level - Diagnosis - Self-esteem
Positive outcomes - Improved relationships - Authenticity - Work environment support - Friendly culture Negative outcomes - Stigma - Discrimination
